snippet.title: ORANGE SEASON - LAUNCH TRAILER | 🍊 COZY FARMING VIDEO GAME 🍊
snippet.description:
Start a new life with Orange Season in Orange Town, a cozy farmirng video game. Build a thriving farm from the ground up. Grow crops, raise animals, and expand your farm by constructing barns, greenhouses, and more. Explore Orange Town’s diverse landscapes, including mountains, forests, and caves, to gather resources and discover hidden treasures. Along the way, befriend the villagers, complete quests, and develop meaningful relationships. Whether farming, exploring, or building connections, Orange Season offers a relaxing and immersive experience. Begin your farming adventure today and create the life you’ve always dreamed of!

00:00 - Intro
00:19 - Build Your New Life in Orange Season
00:39 - Progress on your farm
00:58 - Know the locals of Orange Town
01:11 - Close and out now reveal

@juanfranrivero

About SOEDESCO:
SOEDESCO is an independent video game developer, publisher, and distributor founded in 2002 by Soedesh Chauthi with its headquarters in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, and offices in Madrid, Spain & Pilsen, Czech Republic. We deliver creative content across multiple genres and platforms for a worldwide audience in physical and digital formats.
